@Blabbus25
In some cases it's enough to just mount the .DMG. 
You do this by opening toast titanium (download-able at TPB) and then go to "utilities" in the top menu of your mac screen. Then you choose "mount disc image" and select the .dmg that was used for the game. 
Then you just follow whatever instructions are included.
